channel.title: Problems with my portals
channel.description: I have a portal set up to escape a pk area, but the problem is if you click it, it teles you from wherever you stand, instead of making sure you run to the portal first. Making escaping to easy. How can this be fixed?

item.title: Problems with my portals
item.dc:creator: @picostud picostud
item.description:
@picostud wrote:

When you click a portal, it tele’s you regardless of how far you are away from it. How do I set it so you have to be right next to the portal to use it?

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with my portals
item.dc:creator: @H20wnage H20wnage
item.description:
@H20wnage wrote:

umm did u try setting it so that there is a limit like says u must be in the area 3X3 much like the area settings on ice burst but u must be in one of the outer squares of the portal so make something like unless.area = “3,3” of object portal #“0001” if else return Null or im not really good at this but u asked how could u i was thinking if u knew what u could do u could write ur own function for area space. hope it gives u a idea cause i dont got any :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.description:
@fruits wrote:

make it more clear what you are saying
